verbose_text: Excessive TGF-beta1 secretion by macrophages following operative injury plays an important role in intraperitoneal adhesion formation via the Smad 2/3 signaling pathway, stimulating increased expression of plasminogen activator inhibitor (PAI) -1 and decreased expression of tissue-type plasminogen activator (t-PA) XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR.
